column1: 5a31c3bb81f6f: Robot doesnt understand anything and asks too many irrelevant question
5a31c16986c89: that is nice and good experience
5a31c5b9e6391: The robot became convinced that I wanted it moved to a specific place and no matter what I said I couldn't get it to change the destination
5a31cbf0a938a: These get worse and worse. I don't understand why the interface doesn't have a method of setting some sort of control.
5a31c9b32a245: The robot's language skills are inadequate.
5a31c2b311b71: It said my task to solve was: "the robot is at the x" -- that is not a task
column2: I had no Idea what I was supposed to do.  The robot really needs to have a concept of self to be of any use.
